price: Isheen sun, keeyyattoota Rabbiiti, ishee sirratti qaraana, Rabbiin aalama hundaafuu miidhaa kan fedhu hin taane.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
